realtime_memories.content: Phase 3 (Agent Memory System) completed in v1.2.0. All agent memory components implemented: AgentMemoryManager, SessionManager, WorkingMemoryManager, EpisodicMemoryManager, DecayEngine, SalienceEngine, MultiAgentMemoryManager, ConflictResolver.

Phase 3B (Memory Intelligence) added to roadmap based on research paper 'From Storage to Experience: A Survey on the Evolution of LLM Agent Memory Mechanisms' (Luo et al., 2026). Features: Memory Validation, Trajectory Compression, Cross-Trajectory Abstraction, Procedural Memory, Heuristic Guidelines, Active Exploration, Causal Reasoning, World Modeling, Memory Tiering, Knowledge Compression.

CLAUDE.md updated with three ManagerContext initialization patterns: (1) Object with storagePath for JSONL, (2) Object with storageType:'sqlite' for SQLite, (3) String path with MEMORY_STORAGE_TYPE env var.
Commit 5af49c4 pushed to origin/master: 'docs: add Phase 3B Memory Intelligence roadmap from LLM agent memory research' - 24 files changed, 744 insertions.

Paper analysis identified Storage→Reflection→Experience evolutionary framework. Key gaps addressed in Phase 3B: introspection/error rectification, environment modeling, explicit experience (heuristics/procedures), cross-trajectory abstraction, active exploration drivers.

Consolidated 10 memories → 5 memories. Removed noise (simple requests, truncated responses, error messages). Kept signal: project status, roadmap updates, documentation changes, commit reference, rese
use the memory-mcp and update your knowledge graph for the project.
